name: Wissem Gamra

experience.title: Free-Lance Producer
experience.detail: Producer a feature length film (Captain Invincible is Dead - 2015), and 3 theatre plays (Last of the Maple Leaves - 2015, The Language Archive - 2015, Curse of the Starving Class - 2016)

bio: Generalist programmer, aspiring to develop the next-gen video game console.
smallBio: Into film, a little bit of theatre, and video games. I do programming too.
